name: The job of your dream
description:
You've landed a job as a delivery person with the world's largest delivery company, FedOx.

Your first assignment starts today. We trust that you have all the qualities required to succeed today. Discover every adventures and enjoy the game!

Drive, drift, discover the city, you can do a lot of things!

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1. This Game Jam was the opportunity for me to try Unity and coding globally, The job of your dream is my very first game.

If you want to know why there is so many cakes around the car in the picture above, download the game!

  • Coding : Arkeon#9826
  • Sound Artist : Minozar#8224

Please if you enjoyed play this game, you can rate it. It will help me a lot! 😀
